attributes.action: try the government en block for war crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the proposed 'whitewash' of the war in Iraq inquiry, we the undersigned call upon the Prime Minister to issue legal proceeding immediately to try the government en block for war crimes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
